Boolean to check if has Events

public bool HasInfinity

Bolean to check if has Infinity, if content has bondaries or it connect with others horizontally and vertically

Grid for self-located position in Navigation

List of Contents inside Content

Object to used to Activate Selection

public AlignmentType Alignment

Enum for Alignment, put in acord of content location in grid, if is aligned, misaligned or try to force it to a Navigation

public AxisType Direction

Direction for Forced GridConstructionType
